channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: iFixit Portable Soldering Iron Review: Worthy of Your Work Bench
item.description: The repair gurus at iFixit have created the soldering iron that you didn’t know you’ve always wanted.

item.title: Phlair’s carbon sucking technology could lower direct air capture’s costs
item.description: The startup is taking a different approach to removing carbon dioxide from the air than most of its competitors. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserve...

item.title: Online Casino Workers Went on Hunger Strike Over Working Conditions
